content.description: Tired of Clari's limitation to SFDC? Try Aviso, the only AI-for-sales platform that guides GTM teams with true revenue intelligence. content.title: These high-performance selling teams use Aviso to succeed
Everything Clari does, and a lot more.
content.description: Clari falls short in feature parity with Aviso for a revenue operation and intelligence tool. Aviso’s enterprise-grade platform complements all revenue teams, for a much fairer price.

items.title: Aspect based Sentiment analysis and NLP
Temporal Database with 6-8 Quarters of CRM and other data history

content.title: Features Clari wishes it had
content.description: Packed with features to end all your revenue intelligence woes

items.title: Guide Deal Behavior with WinScore Insights
items.description: Aviso’s AI engine looks at the end of the current quarter for all open deals, considers opportunity fields throughout the sales cycle and values from connected CRM objects (like Owner, Account) and various derived fields (like Close date pushes, Time in the current stage, etc.) to come up with true statistical probabilities to score each opportunity. This helps reps and managers guide deal behaviors and course-correct.

items.title: Aspect and Intent-based Sentiment analysis
items.description: Gauge customer and buyer intent through visual indicators. Aviso’s sentiment analysis picks up on the underlying tone of a conversation in any given prospect meeting and assigns a sentiment score to it. This enables you to discern meeting effectiveness and how buyer sentiment changes with each call.

items.title: SmartTranscripts with Keywords and Highlights
items.description: Automatically-generated call transcriptions and summaries will save your reps lots of valuable time, allowing them to obtain the key takeaways of each prospecting call without having to listen to the entirety of the call. Aviso also generates keyword highlights, points out risks like competitor mentions, and post-call next steps to help align teams and accelerate follow-ups.

items.title: Gauge meeting effectiveness
items.description: Aviso's SmartTranscription uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) technology to automatically transcribe your meeting, analyze it, and extract meeting efficiency metrics from it. Audio markers help distinguish each speaker, allowing reps to discern the needs of each individual stakeholder.

items.title: Compare team performance on the fly
items.description: See your best and worst-performing sellers on the rep leaderboards. Know which of your reps are winning big-ticket deals, engaging top executives, and closing deals faster. This way, you can coach your low performers on those traits and build a high-performance sales engine.

items.title: Unite people and deal data within collaboration spaces
items.description: Dedicated embedded collaboration spaces inside the platform where you can align teams on forecasts, review deals, and coach teams on deal best practices.

items.title: Real-time GPS for your buying process
items.description: Understand buyer-seller engagement levels to see if your reps are engaging the right personas for the deal. Get a summary of the engagement levels– emails sent and received, meetings set up, and whether the frequency of rep-prospect interactions has increased or decreased over time.

items.title: Know Buyer/Seller engagement through Email Insights
items.description: Understand interaction frequency between opportunity teams and customer contacts through an engagement-over-time graph. Furthermore, Aviso’s proprietary algorithms can track metrics from an email body like the emotional context of a mail, email intent, next steps logged by the opportunity team, discussions around sales objections, concerns raised by the buyer and so much more

items.title: WinScore Insights and Explanations
items.description: Know more than just the probability of winning or losing a deal. Aviso’s WinScore explanations help your sellers understand the top factors that cause a deal WinScore to rise or fall. This way, your reps know which areas to focus on, and when to course-correct.

items.title: We switched this year from Clari to Aviso to get enterprise-level agility and a truly integrated revenue operations system. Clari severely limits agility because it is constrained by Salesforce hierarchy and is a solution anyone remotely technical would hate. Aviso takes inputs from CRM and multiple data sources, its service is top-notch, and we save money on CRM licenses
items.description: VP, Sales Operations, $800M Data Platform Leader

items.title: Clari has a performance problem. They said they were 100% ready for run-rate business, complex rolling up forecast through complex hierarchies, applying AI and human judgment on specific products, partial opportunity owners e.g. product specialists, AEs who roll up to different managers but share the same target. They just couldn’t do it. We had to terminate

items.title: Aviso believes in not having a black-box of AI, and lets the reps/managers know what is influencing the risk score. Clari doesn’t have a true AI/Yield forecast that incorporates multiple data points. Clari does have a CRM score at the opportunity level, this score does not influence its yield prediction, which is only based on historic expected values by stage.
